title: Practice-Based Organizational Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management and leadership knowledge, with understanding of workflow processes
context.additional_context: Participants Engage in Workplace-Based Practical Learning Activities, Conducting Discussions, Receiving Feedback, and Submitting Assignments via LMS

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more practical coping strategies in complex organizational problem situations
Learners can make decisions by utilizing embedded sensitivity and judgment in daily work contexts
Learners can establish and implement practical plans for organizational sustainable growth through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
